instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00840 liquid
threads.message:
Board liquid spill
PPBUS_G3H=13V normal? i can't find information on the schematic.
thanks

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00840 liquid
threads.message: Schematics are available in the usual places. Although you wont find donors for this yet.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00840 liquid
threads.message: Actually if you have contacts in China (And I guess if you look really well) you can find trash boards of this model. I'm honestly considering opening an eBay store for these boards no one else out of China seems to offer

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-00840 liquid
threads.message:
i solve the problem with ultra sonic clean.
now work good.
thanks
